targets.rawSql: select ((max(e.Total)-min(e.Total))+(max(s.total)-min(s.total))-(max(e.TotalReturned)-min(e.TotalReturned)))/1000 from EnergyMain as e join EnergySolar as s on date(e.timestamp) = date(s.timestamp) where e.TimeStamp >= curdate()
SELECT (max(Total)-min(Total))/1000 FROM `bbdwh-sql`.EnergyMain WHERE TimeStamp >= curdate() limit  1000000
SELECT max(Total) as maxSolar, min(Total) as minSolar FROM `bbdwh-sql`.EnergySolar WHERE TimeStamp >= curdate() limit  1000000
SELECT (max(TotalReturned)-min(TotalReturned))/1000 FROM `bbdwh-sql`.EnergyMain WHERE TimeStamp >= curdate() limit  1000000

select ((max(e.Total)-min(e.Total))+(max(s.total)-min(s.total))-(max(e.TotalReturned)-min(e.TotalReturned)))/1000 from EnergyMain as e join EnergySolar as s on date(e.timestamp) = date(s.timestamp) where e.TimeStamp >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY);
SELECT (max(Total)-min(Total))/1000 FROM `bbdwh-sql`.EnergyMain WHERE TimeStamp >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY);
SELECT max(Total) as maxSolar, min(Total) as minSolar FROM `bbdwh-sql`.EnergySolar WHERE TimeStamp >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY);
SELECT (max(TotalReturned)-min(TotalReturned))/1000 FROM `bbdwh-sql`.EnergyMain WHERE TimeStamp >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY);
